text: “Zvirokwazvo, munoita chingochani pachenyu, uye kubvutira vanhu vari parwendo zvinhu zvavo! Uye munoita Al-Munkar (kusatenda nehunyengedzi nezvimwe zvitadzo) mumisangano yenyu.” Asi vanhu vake havana zvavakapindura kusara kwekuti: “Ita kuti mutongo waAllah unorwadza uuye kwatiri kana uri mumwe weavo vanotaura chokwadi.”
